bots.authors: You must have at least 1 author of the bot, and all Author IDs must be numeric
bots.category: You must select a category for your bot
bots.customisable: The customisability of the prefix must be either ticked, or unticked
bots.contents: You must select at least one language for your bot to be in. Click a language, and then click "Add a language"
bots.description: The short description must have a length between 10 and 100
bots.githubowner: The GitHub owner needs to be a valid GitHub user. Leave blank if you do not have a GitHub account.
bots.githubrepo: The GitHub repository needs to be a valid string. Leave blank if you do not have a GitHub repository.
bots.id: The Bot ID needs to be filled out, and numeric
bots.invite: The Invite URL needs to be filled out, and as a valid HTTPS link
bots.website: The Website URL needs to be a valid HTTPS link
bots.languages: You must add a single language. Click the language you want your bot page to be in, and select the 'Add a language' button
bots.mentionable: The mentionabiliity of the prefix must be either ticked, or unticked
bots.name: The bot must have a name of length between 4 and 32.
bots.nsfw: The NSFW status must be either ticked, or unticked
bots.oauth: The OAuth ID needs to be numeric
bots.page: The long description must have a length between 20 and 10000
bots.prefix: You must have at least 1 prefix, of max length 10.
bots.support: The Support URL needs to be a valid HTTPS link
bots.exists: The bot already exists in the database, and you do not have permission to overwrite this.
bots.notabot: The ID provided was not a bot account.
bots.notfound: The ID provided was not found by Discord.
bots.add_success: Added bot to the bot list queue.
bots.count: The guild count for a bot must be between 0 and 5000000 servers
bots.avatar: The avatar URL must be a valid HTTPS link, and a maximum of 2000 characters
bots.cover: The cover URL must be a valid HTTPS link, and a maximum of 2000 characters
bots.preview: All preview URLs must be a valid HTTPS link, and a maximum of 2000 characters each, with a maximum of 20 links
bots.no_suitable_lang: This page has no English version. '{{ language }}' is being displayed instead.
bots.youtube: The YouTube ID needs to look like an ID
bots.youku: The Alibaba YOUKU ID needs to look like an ID

permissions.denied: You do not have the adequate permissions to access this
permissions.banned: You have been denied access to this resource

website.noscript: JavaScript has been disabled. Functionality may be reduced.
website.print: JavaScript is not compatible with paper printouts.

reviews.rating: Please select a rating before continuing
reviews.text: Please enter why you gave this number of stars for this bot.
reviews.self: You cannot review your own bot!

api.400: You are unauthorised to use this endpoint. Check your token is correct.
api.404: This endpoint was not found, or the method used to request this page is not compatible.
api.test: An error was thrown for development purposes.
api.idchange: The ID of the bot cannot be changed to another ID. Please contact Terminal support for technical support

bots.description: An application store for Discord bots
bots.adverts: Contains adverts and features locked behind other services

token.title: Token
token.description: This is the token required to edit your bot on this list. Please refer to the developer documentation for available endpoints.

hide.title: Hide bot
hide.description: You can hide your bot from the front page of the website, in case you don't need to be there.

application_id.modal: The OAuth ID is the ID which is used when users invite your bot via the OAuth workflow. In almost all cases, this ID is the same as your Bot ID. You will only need to take action if your bot has a difference between the two.
application_id.placeholder: The ID used in the OAuth link.
application_id.title: OAuth ID

authors.modal: Enter a single ID of an owner of the bot.
authors.title: Bot Authors

support.small: Leave this field empty if you don't like helping people
support.title: Support URL

client_id.modal1: The bot ID is a number which uniquely identifies the bot user. You can retrieve it by clicking the "Copy" button within the Discord Developer portal.
client_id.modal2: You can also find the ID by enabling "Developer Mode" in the Discord settings, and then right clicking your bot and pressing "Copy ID". Be sure not to copy the ID of the message.
client_id.placeholder: The ID of the bot user
client_id.title: Bot ID

invite.modal: Please make sure "Bot ID" has been filled in with your Discord bot's ID
invite.title: Invite URL
invite.placeholder: Enter a link to invite your bot

languages.modal: Write your bot page in any supported language. Select a language, and click the 'Add a language' button.
languages.title: Bot Page Languages

edit.leave: Are you sure you want to leave? Unmodified changes will not be saved.

inAppPurchases.title: In App Purchases
inAppPurchases.small: Tick this box if you have features behind a paywall, such as donations

adverts.title: Advertisments
adverts.small: Tick this box if your bot links to other bot lists, and/or have features that are locked behind other services/bot lists

avatar.title: Avatar URL
avatar.placeholder: A HTTPS link to an avatar image

cover.title: Cover Image
cover.placeholder: A HTTPS link to a large image

preview.title: Preview Images
preview.placeholder: A HTTPS link to a single screenshot

youtube.title: YouTube ID
youtube.placeholder: An ID to a YouTube video

youku.title: Alibaba YOUKU ID
youku.placeholder: An ID to a YOUKU video

website.title: Website
website.placeholder: A HTTPS link to your website

edit.title: Add or Edit an Application
edit.updates: It is highly recommended you join the Terminal.ink Discord Server to view service updates, view your bot verification status, and also recieve direct messages from staff about your application.

error.report: Thanks for taking the time to report this error. Please type in what you were doing before the incident.
error.snarky: This error was going to happen anyway.

locale.pleasehelp: Are you a good translator? Click here.

reviews.title: Reviews
reviews.placeholder: Please enter a reason for your review.

state.reason: Enter reason for changing the state of the bot

pagination.reviews: User reviews for '{{ name }}' - Page { number }

site.name: Discord Apps Marketplace
site.subheading: Find bots to enhance your server
site.description: ls.terminal.ink is an application store for Discord bots. Install applications for music, news, moderation and more for your server.

innovate.heading: Start Innovating
innovate.content: Learn to create your own Discord application for your own personal server

add.heading: Add your bot
add.content: Share your creation to the world; Let others enhance their server experience with your applications
